ctx: intros h st n t es r st' ps H.
remember (currentTerm st =? t) as term_eqn eqn:Heqn.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros h st n t es r st' ps H. unfold handleAppendEntriesReply in H. remember (currentTerm st =? t) as term_eqn eqn:Heqn. destruct Heqn. - destruct r. + inv H. reflexivity. + inv H. - inv H.
